name: Joseph W. CALDWELL, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Caldwell v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections
docket_number: Direct appeal No. 80 M.D. Appeal Dkt. 1999

parties: Joseph W. CALDWELL, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 28th day of March, 2000, the fine levied by the Commonwealth Court is reduced to $5,000. In all other respects, the order dated April 15, 1999 is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
748 A.2d 1233
Joseph W. CALDWELL, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 28, 2000.
